name: Octane Fishing
description:
Deselect: Right click

Toggle fish labels: F

Toggle grid: G

Fishermen catch fish every 0 - 1 minute, fish replish every 1 - 2 minutes. Tiles with over 3 fish will also replenish the fish it's adjacent tiles.

If you think my game is boring and slow, that's because fishing is boring and slow.
